MS MCQs

    Define an AI strategy to create business value in retail - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. What is the end goal of integrating AI into the retail experience?

      Collect and correlate customer data to uncover and discover new insights concerning the customer base.

      Discover new trends of larger competitors to identify and cultivate them through gorilla marketing tactics.

      Act upon data in order to better engage customers and create personalized and consistent experiences.

      Reduce operational costs through AI applications to inventory modeling that incorporates better demand forecasting.


    2. What is a key way AI has helped online retailers become more successful?

      Mass scalability

      Predictive pricing

      Mass personalization

      Demand forecasting


    3. How has the digital transformation of physical stores helped online retailers and their AI strategies?

      It allows them to obtain better-contextualized data on their customers.

      It allows them to increase the amount of data collected by incorporating brick and mortar shoppers.

      Retailers can create separate and distinct experiences for in-store shoppers.

      Online stores can expand their research into shoppers who don’t want their data collected.


    4. What is an example of the type of data that omni-channel retailers are leveraging from their brick and mortar stores to better serve customers?

      Same-store sales revenue.

      In-store visitor feedback.

      Customer traffic flow patterning.

      Weather and traffic prediction modeling.
